statements: DELETE FROM employee_feedback WHERE collaboration_rating < 3 AND employee_id = 100;
DELETE FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 200 AND feedback LIKE '%improvement%';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM team_collaboration_feedback WHERE team_id = 1 AND feedback_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM teams WHERE team_leader_id = 100 AND team_id NOT IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_collaboration_feedback);
DELETE FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 100 AND feedback_date < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 123 AND feedback_date = '2021-07-15';
DELETE FROM collaboration WHERE team_id = 456 AND collaboration_date < '2022-01-01';
